title: Where my blue essence collector ward?
body:
I lost my ward.
It cannot be selected when you select a champion, their icon is not in the return.
Where is he?
It was removed from the game?
Or am I blind and not noticed in the list of updates..
Help, please!

replies.body: It wasn't removed, no worries about that! We've seen a lot of players who had that ward seem to disappear (myself included DX), and AFAIK we're still working on getting that fixed up. I can still see the ward on your account, so it should pop back up when it's figured out!
several others have reported this loss including me. i think it's some sort of bug
